content: Going forward, our plan is to deploy the cash flows generated by the Canadian asset and wealth management business to further deleverage to a target level of 1.5 to 2x and to effectively privatize our business through our normal course issuer bid. I mean the goal is to set up both businesses for incredible success and deliver great value to our Canadian shareholders as a result of the ownership in the U.S., whether that's through a sale or through ongoing strategic ownership.
